title: How do I "equip" the santa baron icon thing
body: I unlocked it as part of the Christmas event, I cant find it in the icon menu, I know I have it because I have the option to gift it to my friend.

replies.body: Could you shoot me a quick screenshot of your icon list? I did just check your account, and that Baron Poro Icon is sitting there right now! You should be able to find it in your icons, but if not we may need to dig around to see what's going wrong.
